questions.question: What is the maximum print size of the Ender 3 Pro V2 3D printer?
questions.answer: The maximum print size of the Ender 3 Pro V2 3D printer is 220 x 220 x 250 mm.

questions.question: What types of filaments can be used with the Ender 3 Pro V2 3D printer?
questions.answer: The Ender 3 Pro V2 3D printer can use 1.75 mm PLA, ABS, PETG, TPU, and other filaments.
